questions.question: Which of the following is NOT true regarding the structure of cardiac muscle?

choices.answer: Actin and myosin form sarcomeres
Intercalated discs contain gap junctions
Intercalated discs form at the Z-line of the sarcomere
Cytoplasm cannot pass freely through gap junctions

questions.question: Which of the following correctly describe the order of events in the cardiac cycle?

choices.answer: Ventricular systole -> Atrial systole -> Diastole
Diastole --> Ventricular systole -> Atrial systole
Atrial systole -> Ventricular systole -> Diastole

questions.question: Signals from the SA node:

choices.answer: Pass directly from atria to ventricles
Cannot pass directly from atria to ventricles

questions.question: Which of the following does NOT take place during control of the heart beat?

choices.answer: The SA node is the pacemaker + generates an action potential
The action potential from the SA node arrives at the AV node
The action potential is delayed at the AV node
The action potential from the AV node causes atrial systole

imageMetadata.resources: Photo by jesse orrico on Unsplash

questions.resources: Photo by jesse orrico on Unsplash

questions.question: Purkinje fibres are conducting fibres that:

choices.answer: Ensure coordinated contraction of the entire atrial wall
Ensure coordinated contraction of the entire ventricle wall
Pass the action potential from SA node to AV node
Pass the action potential from AV node to SA node

imageMetadata.resources: Photo by Marcelo Leal on Unsplash

questions.resources: Photo by Marcelo Leal on Unsplash

questions.question: Normal heart sounds, 'lub-dub' are caused by which consecutive actions:

choices.answer: Closure of AV valves and then closure of semilunar valves
Closure of semilunar valves and then closure of AV valves
Contraction of atria then contraction of ventricles
Contraction of ventricles then contraction of atria

questions.question: If blood pressure is measured as 120/80, the numbers refer to which pressures:

choices.answer: Atrial Systole / Diastole
Ventricular Systole / Diastole
Systole / Diastole
Diastole / Systole

choices.answer: QRS
QR
RS

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT true regarding hypertension?

choices.answer: Obesity and sedentary lifestyle can increase the risk
Plaque builds up in arteries
The lumen of coronary arteries is widened
Hypertension can lead to stroke or heart attack

questions.question: Which of the following can treat a life threatening cardiac condition such as a heart attack?

choices.answer: Pacemaker
Defibrillators
Stent
EKG
